com.intland.codebeamer.persistence.dto

Class TrackerItemEditingContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intland.codebeamer.persistence.dto.TrackerItemEditingContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BaseDto, java.io.Serializable

    public class TrackerItemEditingContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements BaseDto
    A helper class to pack a tracker item, it's current layout and it's current field access permissions together
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • TrackerItemEditingContext

        public TrackerItemEditingContext(UserDto user,
                         TrackerItemDto issue,
                         WorkflowTransitionDto transition)
        Easier initialization for an user/issue pair. Only keeps fields with at least READ permissions
        Parameters:
        user -
        issue -
        transition - Optional transition will be executed, so layout is calculated for that
